description.en: A fighter, a wizard and a misguiding spirit are on Nameless Isle-what happens next is the stuff of heroes - or not! It's up to them.

altTitles.ja: 30MS AROUND!

description.en:
"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"
Enjoy the relaxed everyday life of the sisters ✨

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters
Also available on the Bandai Hobby Site: https://bandai-hobby.net/site/30minutes_sisters/extra/around/

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.ja: I Don't Know Which Is Love

altTitles.ja: どれが恋かがわからない

altTitles.id: Aku Nggak Tau Yang Mana Cinta

altTitles.ja-ro: Dore ga Koi Ka ga Wakaranai

description.en: Our protagonist, Soraike Mei, confessed her unrequited love to her friend at the high school graduation ceremony… That was the plan, at least. Her confession was a failure. Because of that, she is keen to “Definitely get a girlfriend during college!” But for some reason, one woman after another keeps on approaching her?!
description.id: Mei, seorang gadis yang pernah merasakan pahitnya cinta yang telah direbut oleh suatu cowok pada saat kelulusan SMA, mencoba berusaha untuk menggaet cewek di Universitas. Namun, dalam kehidupan di kampusnya, dia tidak hanya didekati oleh 1 cewek, tetapi 5 cewek! Apakah Mei dapat bertahan hidup karenanya?

altTitles.ja: 屍町アンデッド

description.en: The urban exploration of two teenagers causes them to run into a mysterious "box", which encloses those infected with a virus called "corpse". In that city, there is a teacher named Katsuragi Zakuro. Which hides a secret ……

altTitles.en: Get to the point instead of beating around the bush

altTitles.ja: 恋愛エトセトラ

description.en:
Just when Chu Hyejin, a freshman in college, is about to start her independent college life, she encounters a crisis. Her first love, Cha Haejun lives right next to her?! And on top of that, she is the one who dumped him when they dated in middle-school!  
  
A 15-year old's clumsy and awkward first love soon came to an end but will things be different this time when they're 20?  
  
(Note: Gatabutata is a Korean saying that means "Get to the point instead of beating around the bush".)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)
description.fr:
Au moment où Chu Hyejin, une étudiante de première année, est sur le point de commencer sa vie d'étudiante indépendante, elle est confrontée à une crise. Son premier amour, Cha Haejun, vit juste à côté d'elle ! Et en plus de cela, c'est elle qui l'a largué quand ils sont sortis ensemble au collège !

Le premier amour maladroit et gênant d'une jeune fille de 15 ans touche à sa fin, mais les choses seront-elles différentes cette fois-ci à 20 ans ?

(Note : Gatabutata est un dicton coréen qui signifie "Va droit au but au lieu de tourner autour du pot").
description.ja:
人生初の一人暮らしに胸をときめかせていた琴梨(ことり)。 しかし、引っ越し先のお隣に住んでいたのは中学の時に付き合ってた元カレだった⁉ 再会した初恋の彼ともう一度、甘酸っぱい恋を始める！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)
description.ko:
모든 게 서툴고 어색했던 중학교 2학년 15살의 첫 연애.
그렇게 헤어졌던 첫사랑을 같은 대학, 자취방 바로 옆집에서 다시 마주하다!
사랑이 뭔지, 연애가 뭔지 아직도 헷갈리고 서툴기만 한 스무 살. 과연 이번엔
스스로에게 당당하고 서로를 솔직하게 마주하는 연애에 성공할 수 있을까?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)
description.zh:
如果再次遇见初恋，
你的选择还会一如从前吗？
在同一所大学与初恋邂逅，甚至发现他居然住我隔壁！二十岁的花季，对爱情还是懵懵懂懂，这次能否坦诚面对，最终有情人终成眷属？

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/zaiciyujianni/list?title_no=1466)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)

altTitles.ja: 朝の風景

description.en: A Mahoutsukai no Yoru oneshot published in TM Ace 16, featuring Soujuurou Shizuki.

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

description.en: A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

title.en: Potion wa 160 km/h de Nageru Mono! ~Item-gakari no Ore ga Bannou Kaifukuyaku o Touteki suru Koto de Saikyou no Boukensha ni Nariagaru!?~ @COMIC

altTitles.ja: ポーションは160km/hで投げるモノ！～アイテム係の俺が万能回復薬を投擲することで最強の冒険者に成り上がる!?～@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Potion ha 160 km/h de Nageru Mono! ~Item-gakari no Ore ga Bannou Kaifukuyaku wo Touteki suru Koto de Saikyou no Boukensha ni Nariagaru!?~ @COMIC

altTitles.en: Potions Are Items Thrown At 160 Km/H! ~As An Item Handler, I'll Ascend To Strongest Adventurer By Throwing Cure-All Potions!?~ @COMIC
Throwing Potions at 160km/h! I Will Become the Strongest Adventurer by Throwing a Universal Recovery Medicine!? @COMIC

description.en:
Vino, a member of the A-class adventurer party "Assault," is a potion user, the weakest and lowest level job.

He meets a beautiful swordsman named Canadia, who is known as the God of Death.
He was kicked out of the party and nearly died in a monster attack, but Vino awakened by chance with the single-minded desire to protect her!

He discovered his own strong shoulders and a new way to use potions, even throwing potions to blast monsters to pieces.

Then their adventure began, but at the same time Canadia started to run amok!

An adventure tale with the strongest pushover wife, it begins!

---

**Character Designer:** [Nitaka](https://mangadex.org/author/80544dac-562c-47ec-abb8-35f07ec2bd12)

[Alt Official Raw (NicoNico Manga)](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54976)
description.ja:
Ａ級冒険者パーティ【アサルト】のメンバー・ヴィーノは、最弱にして最底辺職であるポーション使い。

そんな彼が出会ったのは『死神』と呼ばれる美しい剣士カナディアだった。
パーティから追い出され、モンスターの襲撃で死にかけたヴィーノが彼女を守りたい一心で偶然覚醒！

ポーションを投げてモンスターを爆散させるほどの自らの強肩ぶりと、ポーションの新たな使用法に気付く。

それから二人の冒険が始まったのだが……同時にカナディアの暴走も始まってしまう！？
最強の押しかけ嫁と行く冒険譚、開幕！

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

altTitles.es-la: Dama noble o lo que sea, yo me voy a casa

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

title.en: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん if Episode of 魔フィア

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo!: IF Episode of MAFIA

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...

description.en: One is a girl who has a strange illusion that she died at sea; Another is an athlete in the same year as her at school, who charms her with a look. Soon after, she falls into the water and is saved by her, and begins to want to start a friendship. Her best friend Suhasun suggests a plan to lend her a textbook. But Suhasun actually has an unhealthy crush on her, and wants to keep her by his side at any cost.

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba Monogatari: Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

title.en: All My Abilities Are Forbidden Spells

altTitles.zh-ro: Quanmin Zhuan Zhi Wode Jineng Quan Shi Jin Zhou Qianyue

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我的技能全是禁咒 签约

altTitles.en: Job Transfer For All: My Skills Are All Forbidden Spells

description.en:
Lin Han finds himself transmigrated into a world that merges reality and games. This world is rife with dungeons, forbidden zones, and hidden realms, not to mention rampaging monsters! 

When the time for the Class Change comes, Lin Han doesn’t receive the Warrior Class that he has always dreamt of. 

Instead, he receives the class Life Cleric. Just as he’s despairing over his misfortune…

[Ding! You’ve awakened the “Myriad Augmentation System”!] 

With every attribute augmented ten thousand times, all of Lin Han’s basic skills have turned into Forbidden Spells! 

Watch Lin Han as he dominates the battlefield with his Forbidden Spells and becomes known as a close-combat Healer!
- - -
Crossing to the other world with his soul, Lin Han arrived in an era where games and reality merged. There are countless dungeons, forbidden lands, and hidden realms where mighty monsters reign supreme!

On the day of his class profession, Lin Han missed the opportunity to become a warrior, the class of his dreams! Unexpectedly, he awakened the unique hidden profession – Life Sacrificer – at a critical moment!

[Ding! Ten Thousandfold Amplification System Awakening!]

Lin Han’s attributes increased by ten thousand times, and his basic skills all reached forbidden curses!

In the name of a close-combat healer, during the moment of unlimited forbidden curse devastation!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en:
Hwang Cho-min has been violently bullied since middle school. But when his estranged brother suddenly dies in a motorcycle accident, Cho-min finds out he was the leader of Imperial Gang, a huge gang. 

Now in possession of his brother's phone, Cho-min seizes this chance to get revenge on his high school bullies by ordering his brother's underlings to beat them up. But the King Game begins when his brother's girlfriend shows up and threatens to expose him unless he cooperates in taking down a rival gang. 

With his life now on the line, can Cho-min manage to continue this farce?

title.en: I Can See the Forbidden Zone Rules

description.en:
Two hundred years ago, the White Mist Forbidden Land suddenly appeared, and the world underwent a huge change. Monsters and supernatural beings with various strange powers appeared. 

The White Mist Forbidden Land is known as the Forbidden Zone for Life. Only one in ten thousand people who enter it survives. 

After being imprisoned by the mysterious wall for seven years, Ye Shiqi, who was tired of life, finally stepped into the White Mist Forbidden Land again. 

With the reappearance of blindness, a set of information suddenly appeared in front of Ye Shiqi’s eyes: That is the forbidden zone rules that have troubled mankind for many years!

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我牧师，都什么阴间技能

altTitles.vi: Tiān Shēng Dú Nǎi, Wǒ Zǔzhòule Quán Shìjiè!

description.en:
Traveling through a parallel world, the game merges with the real world, where ferocious beasts are rampant, alien races are raging, and there are a large number of dungeons and secret realms in the wild.
Humans can awaken into various professions and work hard to kill monsters and upgrade.
On the day of his profession awakening, Lin Luo awakened the priest profession, which is the most popular but has no damage ability.
Just when he was struggling, he discovered that his skills had mutated!
The blood recovery technique mutates into the bleeding technique?
Blessing mutates into curse?
But I am really a healing priest!

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

altTitles.ja: ギャルせん

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

altTitles.ja: 回復職の悪役令嬢

altTitles.en: From Villainess to Healer: I Know the Cheat to Change My Fate

description.en: Charlotte discovered that she was in the game world she played in her previous life when her engagement was broken off. With her cheat knowledge, she escapes from the scenario and changes her job to a <healer> in the enemy country, and enjoys a free adventurous life!
description.id: Ketika pertunangannya diputus, Charlotte menyadari bahwa dia berada di dunia game yang dia mainkan di kehidupan sebelumnya. Dengan pengetahuan cheatnya, dia melarikan diri dari skenario cerita dan mengubah pekerjaannya menjadi <Penyembuh> di negara musuh, dan menikmati kehidupan petualangan yang bebas!
description.ja: 婚約破棄されたことをきっかけに、ここが前世でプレイしていたゲーム世界だと気づいたシャーロット。チート知識でシナリオ脱出＆敵国で＜癒し手＞にジョブチェンジして、自由な冒険ライフを堪能します！

title.en: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni

altTitles.ja: 稲穂くんは偽カノジョのはずなのに

altTitles.ja-ro: Inaho-kun Wa Nise Kanojou No Hazu Nanoni

altTitles.en: Inaho-kun Is Supposed to Be a Fake Sweetheart

description.en:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

altTitles.ja: ごきげんよう、一局いかが？

altTitles.en: Good day to you, how about a game?

description.en: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?

title.en: Class ga Isekai Shoukan sareta Naka Ore dake Nokotta n desu ga

altTitles.en: My Entire Class Was Summoned To Another World Except For Me

altTitles.id: Semua Orang Di Kelasku Di Panggil Ke Dunia Lain Selain Aku

altTitles.ru: Весь мой класс, кроме меня, призвали в иной мир

altTitles.ja: クラスが異世界召喚されたなか俺だけ残ったんですが

altTitles.zh-hk: 班級同學都被召喚到異世界，只有我幸存下來

altTitles.zh: 班级同学都被召唤到异世界，只有我幸存下来

description.en:
A god of a different world had abruptly appeared in Kamiya Yato's classroom and forcibly summoned the entire class to his world… except for him, because he was sleeping in a seat in the corner of the class, the round summoning magic circle didn't reach him, and he ended up staying here on Earth, but with brand-new skills.  
  
After he made it through a whole year full of police interviews and journalism reports, he finally became a high school student, but the quiet days he had hoped for were far from over; be it terrorists who decide to occupy his school or even monsters from different world, one by one new incidents take place in the town he lives in…  
  
Will a boy without any motivation be able to save the world?

Note: No raw updates since October 2021; assume hiatus by author. Comic Boost still lists the series as an "irregular serialization" rather than axed, so there remains a slim possibility for future updates.  
  


---
description.ru:
Бог иного мира внезапно появился в классе Камии Ято и принудительно призвал весь класс в свой мир… Кроме него… Потому что он спал в углу класса и магический круг призыва не коснулся его. И он остался на Земле, но обрел новые навыки.  
  
После целого года допросов полицейскими и интервью с журналистами, он наконец поступил в старшую школу, но спокойные дни, которых он так желал, уже давно кончились. Будь то террористы, решившие захватить школу, или монстры из иного мира, в городе, где он живет, происходят одно событие за другим…  
Сможет ли парень безо всякой мотивации спасти мир?
description.pt-br: Um dia, um deus de outro mundo apareceu de repente na classe de Kamiya Yato e invocou pela força toda a sua sala de aula... mas, exceto ele, porque ele estava dormindo em um assento no canto da sala, o círculo mágico não o alcançou e ele acabou ficando na Terra, mas com novas habilidades.Depois de passar um ano cheio de entrevistas policiais e relatórios de jornais, ele acabou se tornando um estudante do ensino médio, mas os dias tranquilos que ele esperava estavam longe de terem terminado, sejam eles terroristas que decidiram ocupar sua escola ou mesmo monstros do outro mundo e novos incidentes ocorrem na cidade onde ele mora...Um garoto sem motivação pode salvar esse mundo?!

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains

altTitles.zh: 我的后宫全是反派魔女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Hougong Quan Shi Fanpai Monü

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

title.en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイトが心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pt-br: Estou preocupado com minha colega de classe coberta de hematomas

altTitles.ro: Sunt îngrijorat Pentru o Colegă Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей однокласснице покрытой синяками

altTitles.tr: Her Tarafı Bandaj Kaplı Olan Sınıf Arkadaşım Hakkında Endişeleniyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi lo lắng cho người bạn cùng lớp đầy những vết bầm tím

altTitles.uk: Я турбуюсь про однокласницю, покриту синцями

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイト

altTitles.en: My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.th: เพื่อนนักเรียนของผมที่มีรอยขีดข่วนเต็มตัวไปหมด

description.en:
A girl in my class is always injured somewhere on her body, and it's not unusual for her to come to school covered in bandages. At a glance, one can tell that this girl is saddled with problems and so no one tries to get involved with her. Even so... I couldn't help myself from being concerned about her.

This is a story about a pair of classmates whose hearts will be brought together under extreme circumstances.

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Note: The original Twitter series has been collected and published into 1 volume under the name Azadarake no Classmate (痣だらけのクラスメイト) by Kadokawa through their Dengeki Comics EX label.

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322312000753/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20079655/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
総「いいね」数300万超！
SNSで大反響の、痛々しくも温かい限界ラブコメーー大幅加筆で待望の書籍化！

いつもどこかを怪我していて、
包帯姿で学校にくることも珍しくないクラスの女子。
見るからに問題を抱えた彼女に
クラスの誰もが関わりを持とうとしなかった。
だけど……俺はどうしても
その子のことが気になってしまって……。
限界の環境で心を寄せる二人の物語。

altTitles.ja: 変人のサラダボウル＠comic

description.en:
While trailing someone, the poor detective Sousuke Kaburagi runs into Sara, an imperial princess from another world who uses black magic. Sousuke and Sara gradually begin living together, but in the blink of an eye, Sara becomes accustomed to modern-day Japan...

Meanwhile, Livia—a female knight who transferred to the world after Sara, is enjoying a surprisingly pleasant life, even though she is homeless. The two otherworldly individuals who live a pleasant and strong life influence Sousuke and the other oddballs who live here, such as a devilish lawyer, a divorce agent, and a cult leader. 

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453038)
description.ja:
異世界の皇女、岐阜で無双！？

貧乏探偵・鏑矢惣助は、尾行中に天から降ってきた金髪の美少女・サラに遭遇。
彼女は自身を異世界の皇女だと言い、とんでもない魔術を披露する。
なし崩し的に惣助の家に居候することになったサラは、
なぜか探偵の仕事に興味を持ちはじめ…？
サラの従者である女騎士・リヴィアをはじめ、変わり者たちが続々登場！
岐阜を舞台に贈る、天下無双の群像喜劇！！

altTitles.ja-ro: Tome wa Hane! Suzusato Koukou Shodoubu

altTitles.ja: とめはねっ!
とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
とめはねっ！−鈴里高校書道部−

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

title.en: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.ja: 元奴隷ですが、鬼の奴隷を買ってみたら精力が強すぎるので捨てたい……

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei o Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.en: I'm a Former Slave, but I Tried to Buy an Oni Slave Whom I Later Found to Have Too Much Energy, so I Want to Throw Him Away...
I Bought a Demon Slave but He's So Strong That I Want to Throw Him Away...

altTitles.zh: 本来身为奴隶，买了鬼做奴隶结果却因为精力太旺盛了好想扔掉

description.en: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her “slave” status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...

His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

altTitles.ja: メジャーセカンド

description.en: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

title.en: Ore no Kokan wa Bishoujo Datta no ka

altTitles.ja: 俺の股間は美少女だったのか

altTitles.en: Turns Out My Dick Was a Cute Girl

altTitles.zh: 我的牛牛变成了美少女

altTitles.pt-br: Acontece que meu pau era uma linda garota

description.en:
A young man wakes up to a small surprise: He doesn't have his dick anymore!
Follow Kosuga, a 2nd Year Highschool  Student, as he lives his life with his dick who turns out to be a cute girl!
description.ja: 高校生の小菅歩陸は地味で退屈な毎日を送っていた。 春休みもきっと地味なものになる…と思っていた歩陸だが―― ――ちんこが美少女に擬人化した!!? 「俺の股間は美少女だったのか」 ってナニがどうなってるんだ!? 美少女になったちんこちゃんとの珍々騒動を描いた ナニコレな下ネタ珍々コメディ、ここに爆誕!!!
description.tr:
Genç bir erkek uyandığında küçük bir sürprizle karşılaşır: Artık çüksüzdür!
Lise 2. Sınıf Öğrencisi Kosuga'nın çükü sevimli bir kıza dönüşür ve macerası başlar!!
description.vi:
Một cậu trai trẻ đón nhận một bất ngờ: Cậu không còn "thằng nhỏ" nữa!
Theo chân Kosuga, nam sinh năm 2 trung học cùng với bé "ciu" hóa thành một cô gái.
description.pt-br:
Um dia um jovem acorda com uma pequena surpresa: Ele não tem mais pênis!
Acompanhe Kosuga, um estudante do 2º ano do Ensino Médio, enquanto ele vive sua vida com o seu pau que acabou de se tornar uma linda garota!

title.en: Oshi no Shuuchakushin wo Namete Ita

altTitles.ja: 推しの執着心を舐めていた

description.en:
Estefania worked herself to the bone for her family’s sake, while they took her for granted. One day, Estefania realized that, reincarnated in the world of her favorite novel, she was a supporting character who didn’t have much time left to live. She closed the book on her days of living in her family’s shadow, and set out to meet her oshi, the Grand Mage Synil Crown. However, as Synil is cold-hearted and ruthless, she had thought to be satisfied with just seeing him once, but before she knew it, she became the target of his attachment―!?
“S- Synil-sama, isn’t this a bit too close…?”
“In what way?”

Note: An “oshi” is a favorite member in an idol group or a favorite character from a story, movie, game, etc.
What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

title.en: Infinite Devouring: From Zero to Hero

altTitles.ja: 武魂覚醒、俺こそ偉大な天道師だ！

description.en: Yang Chen, who keeps failing his performance assessments in an immortal cultivation academy, accidentally discovers that he has the Ancient Dragon Soul. In a world where such souls are rare, he quickly becomes an almighty Heaven Master and is ready to venture into the unknown world with his newfound talent.

Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

title.en: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru ~ Bannou Cheat Skill wo Getto Shite, Mezase Rakuraku Saikyou Slow Life!~

altTitles.ja: ハズレスキル『ガチャ』で追放された俺は、わがまま幼馴染を絶縁し覚醒する ～万能チートスキルをゲットして、目指せ楽々最強スローライフ！～

altTitles.en: After Being Banished For Having The Trash Skill "Gacha", I Came To My Senses And Broke Off Relations With My Selfish Childhood Friend

description.en: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

title.en: Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!

altTitles.ja: 現実(リアル)もたまには嘘をつく
現実もたまには嘘をつく
ゲーム好きの友達と色々する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Real mo Tama ni wa Uso wo Tsuku
Gemuzuki no Tomodachi to Iroiro suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: Hanging Out with a Gamer Girl

altTitles.uk: Іноді навіть реальність може бути оманливою

altTitles.hi: कभी कभी सच भी झूठ होता है!

altTitles.zh: 和喜欢游戏的朋友各种轶事

altTitles.zh-hk: 和喜歡游戲的朋友各種軼事

altTitles.vi: Đi chơi cùng nữ game thủ
Hẹn hò cùng nữ game thủ

description.en: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!
description.fr: Terazaki Kaoru est sur le point de rencontrer son ami en ligne, Nanami. Mais Nanami ne sait pas que Terazaki est en réalité un homme dans la vie réelle! Il sera certainement déçu et dégouté. Mais Terazaki va lui avoir aussi une surprise…
description.id:
Terazaki Kaoru akan bertemu dengan salah satu teman dari Game Online yang dia mainkan bernama Nanami. Namun, Nanami hanya tahu kalau Kaoru di dalam Game adalah karakter perempuan imut yang bernama Kaori, tapi dia tidak tahu kalau Kaoru di dunia nyata sebenarnya adalah seorang laki-laki.

Saat bertemu dengannya nanti, Nanami pasti akan kecewa dan merasa sedikit aneh, namun… Ketika bertemu, Kaoru pun sontak ikut terkejut. Karena Nanami ternyata…
description.it: Terazaki Kaoru sta per incontrare il suo amico di internet, Nanami. Ma Nanami non sa che Terazaki è un ragazzo nella realta! Con questo Nanami Potrebbe rimanerci delusa o forse trovarlo strano (considerando che l' avatar di Kaoru è femminile), ma ciò che il ragazzo non sa, è che riceverà una sorpresa a sua volta…
description.ja:
友達以上、恋人未満のふたりが繰り広げるハイテンションラブコメディ!

ゲーム好きな男の子、薫はネットゲームで知り合った男性と駅で待ち合わせ。女性キャラを使っていたせいで女の子だと勘違いされていることを心配する薫だが、待ち合わせ場所にやってきたのはかわいい女の子で……?
description.pt: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…
description.ru:
Заядлый геймер Каору Тэрадзаки собирается встретиться с подругой Нанами, с которой познакомился в онлайн-игре. До этого они не виделись в реальной жизни, так что Нанами не знает, что, хотя в игре Тэрадзаки использовал женского персонажа, в реальной жизни он — парень. Каору убеждён, что Нанами наверняка будет разочарована этим фактом, но его ждёт сюрприз...

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/124209-real-mo-tama-ni-wa-uso-wo-tsuku))
description.uk: Каору Теразакі — геймер, котрий захоплюється MMORPG, там він знайшов друга, з котрим товаришував протягом досить тривалого проміжку часу. І ось настав час зустрітися з ним особисто – поза межами онлайн. Та все не так просто, як здавалося на перший погляд, так як Каору грав під дівочим аватаром, його товариш вважає, що той – дівчина. Каору знаходиться у тривожному передчутті, що як його друг буде розчарований? Ба більше, на нього також чекав сюрприз – замість іншого хлопця, його другом виявляється симпатична дівчина – Нанамі Осака. До того ж, Нанамі заздалегідь попередила батьків, що приведе з собою друга – подругу. Ситуація ускладняється тим, що у Нанамі занадто турботливий тато, котрий віддубасить кожного хлопця, котрий посміє наблизитися до його доньки. Ця дилема має лише одне рішення: Каору треба переодягтися в дівчину! Чи окупляться зрештою зусилля Каору?! Чи залишаться Каору та Нанамі просто друзями, чи час, який вони провели у реальному житті разом, все змінить? Слідкуйте за їхніми романтичними пригодами, щоб дізнатися!
description.pt-br: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…

altTitles.ja: 303号室の神さま
神様です。サービスするよ
神様と陰気な少年

altTitles.en: I'm a God. I'll serve you.

altTitles.vi: Tôi là một vị thần. Tôi sẽ giúp bạn
Thần và cậu bé u ám

description.en:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/236717)

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

title.en: My God Is a Lustful Man

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Deus É Um Homem Lascivo

altTitles.en: My god is a desire maker

description.en:
Hye-sal, a timid ethics teacher who has lived her whole life without desires, finds that a neighbor who exudes desire and pleasure has moved in next door. With a sexy appearance and a fatal scent, his name is Dionysus, shortened to Dio.

When Dio makes divine wine, the essential ingredient required is the deep desires that humans have never fulfilled in their lifetime. The one who possesses that is Hye-sal! All she desires is her repetitive peaceful daily life, without any other dreams or desires.

Dio begins relentlessly pestering her, using even divine abilities to awaken the deep desires within Hye-sal.
description.pt-br: A reservada professora de ética, Jeon Haesul, levando uma vida sem muitas aspirações, inesperadamente se vê residindo ao lado de uma divindade do desejo e do prazer chamada ‘Dionísio’ ou simplesmente Dio, que exala uma fragrância cativante com uma aparência sedutora. O ingrediente essencial para a criação do vinho por Dio são os desejos profundos e não realizados que os indivíduos carregam ao longo de suas vidas, e Haesul os possui! Tudo o que ela deseja é a tranquilidade rotineira do dia a dia, tendo vivido sem quaisquer outros sonhos ou desejos. Dio, em seus esforços incansáveis ​​para despertar os desejos profundos de Haesul, emprega suas habilidades divinas, transformando a vida dela em uma fonte constante de aborrecimento.

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

description.en: First-year Gilsu Lee transfers schools to run from the bullying and violence. And the new place seems almost perfect. Everyone in his class is friendly and kind, and no one is bullying anybody. Violence? No, we don’t do anything like that in this school. That’s what the “Arena” is for. Don’t forget, Gilsu. What happens in the ring stays in the ring!
